room_title: Escape room "Mayhem on the Menu" by Mental Mansion in Eugene
review: Went to Mental Mansion for a friend's birthday and somehow managed to complete this room. This was my first escape room experience outside of a video game. "Mayhem" is the perfect word for it. Had so much fun! Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Mayhem on the Menu" by Mental Mansion in Eugene
review: What an awesome escape room! We did the Mayhem on the Menu one and it was a good combo of challenging, active, and fun. Some really creative stuff in there, and you can tell that Casey cares about making a good escape room experience. Looking forward to trying out the other one!
